text: Interview diya aaj yaar tough tha üòÖ
Technical round tough tha bhai nervous
HR round bekaar tha seriously waste
Interviewer rude tha yaar bad experience
Ghost kar diya after interview bhai koi response nahi

Sir please mera marg darshan kare kripa muhje bataye ki mujhe kya sikhna chaiye web development, devops,data science,ya data analysts,aur kya web development ka trend khatam hogaya hai ya aur advanced hogaya hai Ai ke saath intigrate ho kar

After 1 rejection My Family asked me to join for some food and bread anywhere This is part of life... üòÇ Now Teaching few students also free as not everyone can afford neither everyone can always achieve... Apne to wo Goalkeeper banke reh gaye jo sirf bachate hai... Goal marna apne bass ki naa rahi...üò¢
Ai engineer hai 2024 fasher
Are bhai pr Tu read kark kyu bol. Rha hai
Sir can you suggest the exact questions on leet code tha must be solve to join Google or sir plese give a dsa sheet that helps to crack lower then google companies
Mai Isko personally Janta hun , Bhai flipkart ka offer letter paake bhi TCS ko gaya , Truly an Indianüéâ
Bro really inspiring konsa clg tha tera
Bhai tu robot ban gaya hai
Faang ka craze kabka gaya ...... Ab tcs infosys mein job nahi lagri
If you se FAANG..... RUN FOR YOUR SOUL !!
Sir aapka reporting time kya tha upsc bhawan
Sir jiska interview at afternoon pe hota hai uska reporting time kya hota hai
Itna sara bolne kaliae interviewer ke pass Time nhi hota Adhi baat mein Okay kehe deta hai interviewer.üòÖ
Etna fast to rata lag raha hai
Interviewer knows ki aesa reply aaya toh smjh jao ki ratta lgakr aaya hai pakka
Mamta respect hi nahin hai good morning mam good afternoon mam good evening mam yah kaun bolega
Jitna makhan lagana hai lga lo üòÇ woh job reference wale ko hi dega üòÖüòÖüòÇ

Kaam dene me bht saare nakhre.ki wazeh se accha staff nhi milta hai .boll bachan karne wale ko job pehle milti hai . Job k interview ko itna hard bana diya hai k job karne wala be confused ho k interview de nhi pata hai.

Hello mai jana sonchriun dubai job ke liye as a fresher tbh zada skills nahi just degrees hai mere pas recently 2weeks bfr maine apna mba k last sem ke exams diye hai lkn kuch computer skills nahi hai mere pass so kis type ki jobs milnge udar kuch idea hai ?
Hindi language kyuu nhi interview hota h... Kamal h indian h pr english ko lekar bethe h itni buri bt h üò¢üò¢üò¢üò¢
Or hame English hi nhi aati ho toüò¢
Hindi me baat ni kr sakte kya maam?üò¢

Ye second kutta sala bol rha hai india mai kuch nhi hua sale ka dimag khrab ho gya ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ logo ki jane gyi hai aur bol rha hai india me kuuch nhi hua hai chloo india ki btt choro india mai ho ya na ho pakistan me bohot kuch hoga no water no life
Jitna bakwas ki hai answer kis ny deny
Maim aap is rool se jada us rool pe jada achi lagti hai reel me
V.nice research. Aapke explain krne ka pattern is very good. now plz ans.these Q.too. üëç
